reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Smith's lectures are thorough and engaging. She explains complex topics clearly, but sometimes goes through material too quickly.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson is excellent! His teaching style is straightforward, and he always makes time for questions.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is knowledgeable, but her lectures can be a bit hard to follow. Her office hours are very helpful though.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's lectures lack structure and are often hard to follow. The course material is interesting, but he doesn't seem very organized.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is a great professor. Her labs are well-organized and she is always willing to help students outside of class.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Brown is amazing! His lectures are thought-provoking and he encourages class discussion. Highly recommend his classes.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Martin's lectures are interesting, but her grading can be tough. Make sure to participate in class to understand her expectations.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Prof. Garcia is very knowledgeable about programming. His assignments are challenging but fair. Great professor for CS majors.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez's lectures can be monotonous and difficult to understand. The exams are tough and not well-aligned with the lectures.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Hernandez is fantastic. He makes political science interesting and relevant. His classes are a must-take!

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is a passionate professor who cares about her students. Her classes are engaging, though sometimes the workload is heavy.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Rodriguez is very knowledgeable, but his lectures can be dry. You need to be interested in the subject to enjoy his class.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is an exceptional professor. His enthusiasm for the subject is contagious, and he really knows how to engage his students.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Walker has a good grasp of the material, but her classes can feel a bit rushed. Her grading is fair if you follow her guidelines.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Young explains statistical concepts very clearly. His classes are well-structured, though the exams are quite challenging.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Hall's classes are not very engaging, and she seems disinterested in teaching. The content could be interesting with a different approach.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Allen is one of the best professors I've had. His lectures are detailed, and he provides real-world applications for every concept.

reviews.subject: Geography
reviews.review: Prof. King makes geography interesting with her interactive lectures. Be prepared for detailed map quizzes, though.

reviews.subject: Law
reviews.review: Dr. Scott's classes are informative, but they can be overwhelming due to the amount of reading. However, he is approachable during office hours.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Prof. Harris is a great professor who loves what she teaches. Her enthusiasm makes the classes enjoyable, although the exams are tough.
